page.title: 06Guides in Wrecclesham
page.content: Every Tuesday the{Wrecclesham Guides meet at Leverton Hall between 6.45pm and 8.15pm.Each week every guide pays 30p for the use of 1 kitchen,toilets, and hall.On average 17 guides attend. There are 4 patrols.Each year the guides go to{summer camp.}It costs between Â£19.30 and Â£30.00.This pays for the hire of the tents and the price of the food and sometimes the hire of canoes.This year there are a lot more events because it is the {75th anniversary of Guiding.}We have had two celebration parties.At Guides they do a different selection of things.Sometimes they do games or crafts.On other weeks they have disscusions and they plan for the next term.
